title: `oneOf` must contain at least two schemas
description: A single-branch `oneOf` is meaningless; use the schema directly instead.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: oneOf with a single branch
comprehensiveExamples.description: A single-schema oneOf is pointless; use the schema directly or add another distinct alternative.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: oneOf with at least two branches
comprehensiveExamples.description: Using two or more distinct alternatives is valid.

message: Add a second branch or remove `oneOf` wrapper.
